ARABIC: إِذْ تَقُولُ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَلَن يَكْفِيَكُمْ أَن يُمِدَّكُمْ رَبُّكُم بِثَلَٰثَةِ ءَالَٰفٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ مُنزَلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And when you said to the muminun, 'Is it not enough for you that your Lord reinforced you with three thousand angels, sent down?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Remember when you said to the faithful: "Is it not sufficient that your Lord should send for your help three thousand angels from the heavens?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And recall when you said to the believers: 'Will it not suffice you that your Lord will aid you by sending down three thousand angels?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Also, remember when you said to the believers, "Is it not enough that your Lord is helping you with a force of three thousand angels sent (from the heavens)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When you O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) said to the believers, “Is it not sufficient for you that your Lord may support you by sending down three thousand angels?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Remember) when you said to the believers, "Is it not enough for you that your Lord should help you with three thousand angels sent down"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When you said to the believers: Does it not suffice you that your Lord should assist you with three thousand of the angels sent down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When thou saidst to the believers, 'Is it not enough for you that your Lord should reinforce you with three thousand angels sent down upon you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When thou didst say unto the believers: Is it not sufficient for you that your Lord should support you with three thousand angels sent down (to your help)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [And remember] when you said to the believers, "Does it not suffice that your Lord helps you by sending down three thousand angels?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Recall what time thou saidst to the believers: sufficieth it not unto that your lord should reinforce you with three thousand angels sent down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When you were saying to the faithful, ‘Is it not enough for you that your Lord should aid you with three thousand angels sent down?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Remember thou saidst to the Faithful: "Is it not enough for you that Allah should help you with three thousand angels (Specially) sent down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Remember) when you (Muhammad SAW) said to the believers, "Is it not enough for you that your Lord (Allah) should help you with three thousand angels; sent down?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When you said to the believers: 'Is it not enough for you that your Lord should reinforce you with three thousand angels sent down upon you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When you said to the believers, “Is it not enough for you that your Lord has reinforced you with three thousand angels, sent down?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Remember] when you said to the believers, "Is it not sufficient for you that your Lord should reinforce you with three thousand angels sent down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:124] When (idh, an adverbial qualifier of nasarakum, ‘He gave you victory’ [in the previous verse]) you were saying to the believers, promising them as reassurance [for them]: ‘Is it not sufficient for you that your Lord should reinforce you, [that] He should succour you, with three thousand angels sent down? (read munzalīn or munazzalīn, ‘sent down’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when thou didst say unto the believers) on the Day of Uhud: (Is it not sufficient for you) regarding your enemy (that your Lord should support) that your Lord should help you (you with three thousand angels sent down?) from heaven to help you.
